member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.Converter_CannotFindType
member.summary: Cannot find the type "{0}".

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.Converter_InvalidSourceType
member.summary: The source type of the converter is {0}, which does not match the type of the source member: {1}.

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.Converter_InvalidTargetType
member.summary: The target type of the converter is {0}, which does not match the type of the target member: {1}.

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.Creator_CannotFindConstructor
member.summary: Type '{0}' does not have a parameterless constructor.

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.Emit_InvalidCastType
member.summary: Cannot cast from type '{0}' to type '{1}'.

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.InvalidLambdaExpression
member.summary: The lambda expression must be property or field access expression.

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.TypeMapper_Initialized
member.summary: The type mapper has been initialized. Please configure options before the other configurations.

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.TypeMapper_MemberNameCannotNullOrEmpty
member.summary: The name of the target member cannot be null or empty.

member.name: P:PowerMapper.Strings.TypeMapper_ReadOnly
member.summary: The type mapper is read-only.
